highAccuracyAnalysis.content: This is a well-researched article about artificial intelligence developments. The content is factual and properly sourced...
highAccuracyAnalysis.fullContent: This is a well-researched article about artificial intelligence developments. The content is factual and properly sourced with references to peer-reviewed studies and established industry reports.

mediumAccuracyAnalysis.content: Our AI system shows promising results with approximately 85% accuracy in most test cases...

hallucinations.explanation: Language like 'revolutionary breakthrough' suggests potential exaggeration

mediumAccuracyAnalysis.fullContent: Our AI system shows promising results with approximately 85% accuracy in most test cases. This represents a revolutionary breakthrough in the field of machine learning.

lowAccuracyAnalysis.content: Our system achieves exactly 99.7% accuracy with zero false positives and unprecedented results...

hallucinations.explanation: Suspiciously specific statistic without verifiable source

lowAccuracyAnalysis.fullContent: Our system achieves exactly 99.7% accuracy with zero false positives and unprecedented results in all test scenarios. According to recent studies, this represents a 1000x improvement over existing solutions.

batchAnalysisResult.content: Marketing document 1 of 5 in batch analysis...

hallucinations.explanation: Absolute statement 'all customers' is statistically unlikely to be true

batchAnalysisResult.fullContent: Marketing document containing claims that all customers report satisfaction with our product's perfect performance record.

scheduledAnalysisResult.content: Automated scan of Google Drive folder detected potential issues...

hallucinations.explanation: Claim 'industry-leading' appears to be unverifiable or lacks proper attribution

scheduledAnalysisResult.fullContent: Quarterly report highlighting our industry-leading performance metrics and customer satisfaction scores.
